panels.content:
Flow Data by Science Discipline

Select a Discipline from the dropdown above.
This sankey graph shows the top 10 source science organizations by volume for the selected disciplines in a specific period of time.
It then shows their disciplines and the top 5 destination science organizations for each. Thicker lines indicate larger flows.
All times are displayed in browser local time.
Sankey of Top Science Talkers by Discipline

panels.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only flows where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry and were seen by the selected sensor(s) are counted.
